biotools.summary: ProSMoS facilitates protein structure patterns searches. The web program converts 3D structures into an interaction matrix model including such details as the secondary structural element (SSE) type, handedness of connections between SSEs, coordinates of SSE start and ends, etc and then retrieves all structures from a database that contain this pattern.
